attributes.title: CRO in a post-cookie world, with Lisanne Maatman & Dumky de Wilde (DEPT)
attributes.summary:
Learn about how you can still continue running online experiments without relying on browsers to accept cookies (since they do so less and less).

Podcast Partners: Convert.com, OnlineDialogue.com, Sitespect.com, Contentsquare.com and OnlineInfluence.com
attributes.description:
Shownotes: https://www.cro.cafe/podcast/cro-in-a-post-cookie-worldPartners:
  • Convert: convert.com/features
  • Online Dialogue: onlinedialogue.nl
  • SiteSpect: sitespect.com
  • Contentsquare: contentsquare.com
  • Online Invloed: onlineinvloed.nl
 Guest 1: Lisanne Maatman URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/lisanne-maatman | Guest 2: Dumky de Wilde URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/dumky-de-wilde
